Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Gen AI was more in depth, and when you provide it with the marking criteria, provides a complete breakdown of your marks, showing where you can improve more.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: tutors can be incredibly condescending at times, assuming any piece of information should be common knowledge. AI doesn't do that, if you ask it to elaborate on a section of feedback, it will, without being rude.
